short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a strong visual alert when a Flic button is pressed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension shows a strong visual alert on a desktop computer when a Flic button is pressed. The extension uses the Pushover service for distributing messages.
